net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.util

Class JavaScriptEscape

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.util.JavaScriptEscape

  • public final class JavaScriptEscape
extends Object
    Escapes String objects for use in JavaScript.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

        Escape the String for use as JavaScript data.

        Returns:
